channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-3709] Executors don't always report broadcast block removal properly back to the driver
item.summary: Executors don't always report broadcast block removal properly back to the driver

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:

https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/2591
It looks like this was fixed in all branches by Reynold's PRs, so I'm going to mark this as Fixed.
